app_name: Kiss Marry or Kill Anime Game Challenge Quiz
app_detail:
In this exciting game you are given a choice of three heroines from the famous anime, with which three actions are available: to kill, kiss or marry. In each round, you have to decide which of the proposed characters will become your Waifu or Husbando, and which one will be left out. After that, the general statistics will appear on the screen, and you will be able to compare your choice with the preferences of other players. At the moment, the game features over 1000 characters from the best anime, but if you have suggestions for completing this list, we will be happy with your ideas.

How to play:
â˜… To select the action (Kiss, Marry, Kill) click on the picture, then select the desired icon in the panel at the bottom of the screen.
â˜… To open a picture in full screen, just click on it ğŸ˜…
â˜… In the upper left corner there is a button, when clicked, the author's page of the image opens.
â˜… In order to offer a new title, use the submission form. To do this, click on the gear in the main menu of the game.

The names of the characters belong to their authors. All images are taken from open sources, and each of them has a link to the author's page. Contact us if you want to remove them from the game. Email for offers is below.
